external_games.name: Temple of the Faceless Minotaur Who Sees the Burning Light

name: Temple of the Faceless Minotaur Who Sees the Burning Light
summary: Temple of the Faceless Minotaur Who Sees the Burning Light (TotFMWStBL for short) is made for #lowrezjam and is a roguelikelike with randomly generated levels. I'm extremely happy with how it turned out (especially considering the timeframe) and I hope you enjoy playing it. Expect to die a lot as you learn the ins and outs of the game.
